plot: The memory of a man's love for a stranger woman and her mystery death. Based on the short story 'The Crimson Curtain' by Barbey d'Aurevilly.
title: Albertine
plot_es: The memory of a man's love for a stranger woman and her mystery death. Based on the short story 'The Crimson Curtain' by Barbey d'Aurevilly.
plot_en: The memory of a man's love for a stranger woman and her mystery death. Based on the short story 'The Crimson Curtain' by Barbey d'Aurevilly.
